The user creates a miniature-sized Rasengan through limited supplies of chakra. The full effect of the technique is unknown as Naruto collapsed before using it.

== Trivia ==
* This technique was first introduced in ''[[Rock Lee's Springtime of Youth Full Power Ninja Chronicles]]'', and is the first technique to be used outside of its series.
